content: from *crochet doilies and edgings* by cornelia mee published in 1846 engraving on page 10 of the downloaded pdf file unnumbered in the original instructions on pages 2-4 of the original pages 19-21 of the pdf document thread called for is boar s-head cotton no 8 or 10 and a no 16 crochet hook no finished size is given
